newsitem.title: COSTA RICA: Andres storms drop rain along Centam Pacific coast.
newsitem.headline: Andres storms drop rain along Centam Pacific coast.

text.p: Central American nations remained on alert on Saturday for possible flooding because of rains from Tropical Depression Andres along the Pacific coast.
As of early Saturday, no heavy flooding was reported and rains were said to be light.
In Costa Rica the National Emergency Commission declared a state of alert on Friday night. In Nicaragua, fishing and domestic flights were cancelled.

The first storm system in the Pacific this season, Andres was located earlier in the morning on the coast of El Salvador, with rains also reported in Mexico's Guerrero and Chiapas states, Guatemala, Nicaragua and Costa Rica.
Andres was downgraded from tropical storm on Friday, as it crept down the Pacific coast from Mexico.
